rows.label: tlk42420151_01_msg0001
rows.name:
I was relaxing on the roof at night, gazing at the sky,
when someone stepped on me.

rows.label: tlk42420151_01_msg0002
rows.name:
It felt like they were wearing iron boots,
and it was very painful.

rows.label: tlk42420151_01_msg0003
rows.name:
I asked a soldier of the Superbian Empire
to find the culprit for me.

rows.label: tlk42420151_01_msg0004
rows.name:
But a person that strong... I don't think
anyone but Meleph-sama could
capture them.
